name: Format\Gallery
description: The component for displaying a sequence of images in a specific order as a horizontal strip.

properties.name: items
properties.description: An array of the images that will appear in the gallery. The order used in the array is the order of the images in the gallery. Gallery items can be JPEG (with .jpg or .jpeg extension), PNG, or GIF images.

properties.name: role
properties.description: This component always has a role of gallery.
